DOC.brief_title: Quality Anticoagulation With Warfarin Patient With Atrial Fibrillation Secondary Stroke Prevention Korea
DOC.detailed_description: - To assess quality anticoagulation warfarin real world practice Korea secondary stroke prevention patient AF-related Cardioembolic ( CE ) stroke 1 ) initiate warfarin therapy treatment least 7 day warfarin adjustment period ( warfarin-initiated cohort ) , 2 ) initiate maintain warfarin therapy least 90 day 7 day warfarin adjustment period ( long-term warfarin-treated cohort ) . - To explore predictor poor INR control .
